alert.note: Alert for Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 7:47AM MST until December 15 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches, except between 10 and 18 inches above 8500 feet. Snow may mix with rain at times Wednesday afternoon. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 2 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Traffic speeds will be reduced. Allow extra time to reach your destination. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes. The weight of heavy wet snow may lead to power outages from broken tree limbs and downed power lines.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
